infos.value: King Robb... F-forgive me...
Spare your apologies.
If I had not chosen to charge in so recklessly...
I find no fault in the strategy you employed.
...Though perhaps our miscalculation was underestimating Vistralle.
B-but...
We could have held back and assessed the situation calmly, and yet...
The outcome...would have remained the same?
Yes, I believe so.
U-urgh...!
King Robb!
Where is that damned medic!?
King Robb, you must give the order to retreat!
P-please. We would be run through if they launched a full-scale assault now...!
Alas, I suspect that a retreat would play right into Vistralle's hands...
No...
A headstrong man such as Engelbert not showing his face on the front lines...
...Vistralle would know that something was awry.
There is no telling what would unfold should he learn that I suffer these wounds...
Th-then, we assault the castle as originally planned...?
It may be the only way to outwit Vistralle and his schemes.
...Understood. I swear...I'll end him.
U-urgh... G-godspeed to you.
Fennes's forces are approaching!
...And we shall meet them head-on!
